base_description: Compact, oval-shaped device with screen and keyboard.
part_description: Consists of a screen, QWERTY keyboard, and control pad. Screen is centrally positioned, keyboard below it with raised keys, and control pad to the right.
internal_interaction_description: The screen displays information and interfaces with the keyboard and control pad. The keyboard allows text input, while the control pad navigates on-screen options. Each component is integrated to provide seamless user interaction within the device.
external_interaction_description: Interacts with users through the screen, keyboard, and control pad for input and navigation. Can connect to other devices via wireless or wired connections for data transfer and communication.
